components.name: wy-form-field
components.title: Form Field
components.description: Form input wrapper with labels, helper text, and error states

examples.name: Basic
examples.code:
<wy-form-field label="Full Name" id="name-input">
  <input type="text" id="name-input" placeholder="Enter your name">
</wy-form-field>

examples.name: With Helper Text
examples.code:
<wy-form-field label="Email Address" id="email-input" description="We'll never share your email">
  <input type="email" id="email-input" placeholder="you@example.com">
</wy-form-field>

examples.name: Required Field
examples.code:
<wy-form-field label="Password" id="password-input" required>
  <input type="password" id="password-input" placeholder="Enter password">
</wy-form-field>

examples.name: Error State
examples.code:
<wy-form-field label="Password" id="password-error" error="Password must be at least 8 characters">
  <input type="password" id="password-error" aria-invalid="true">
</wy-form-field>

props.label: Password
props.error: Password must be at least 8 characters

examples.name: With Select
examples.code:
<wy-form-field label="Category" id="category-select">
  <select id="category-select">
    <option>Private Equity</option>
    <option>Real Estate</option>
    <option>Venture Capital</option>
  </select>
</wy-form-field>

examples.name: With Textarea
examples.code:
<wy-form-field label="Description" id="description-input" description="Provide a brief description">
  <textarea id="description-input" rows="4" placeholder="Enter description..."></textarea>
</wy-form-field>

props.name: id
props.description: Input ID (should match input element's id)

components.name: wy-filter-chip

components.description: Toggleable filter chip with optional count badge

examples.name: Group

components.name: wy-tag-chip
components.title: Tag Chip
components.description: Visual pill for individual tags with remove functionality

examples.name: Group

components.name: wy-tag-input
components.title: Tag Input
components.description: Autocomplete-enabled input for managing multiple tags

examples.name: With Tags
examples.code:
<wy-tag-input placeholder="Add tag..." id="tag-input-1"></wy-tag-input>
<script>
  const input = document.getElementById('tag-input-1');
  input.tags = [
    { value: 'Modernism', source: 'user-entered' },
    { value: 'Heritage', source: 'ai-generated' }
  ];
</script>

examples.name: With Suggestions
examples.code:
<wy-tag-input placeholder="Add tag..." id="tag-input-2"></wy-tag-input>
<script>
  const input = document.getElementById('tag-input-2');
  input.suggestions = [
    { value: 'Portrait', count: 12 },
    { value: 'Landscape', count: 8 },
    { value: 'Abstract', count: 5 },
    { value: 'Minimalism', count: 15 }
  ];
</script>

examples.name: Full Example
examples.code:
<wy-form-field label="Tags (with Autocomplete)" id="tag-field" description="Type to see suggestions">
  <wy-tag-input id="tag-specimen" placeholder="Add custom tag..."></wy-tag-input>
</wy-form-field>
<script>
  customElements.whenDefined('wy-tag-input').then(() => {
    const tagInput = document.getElementById('tag-specimen');
    tagInput.tags = [
      { value: 'Modernism', source: 'user-entered' },
      { value: 'Heritage', source: 'ai-generated' }
    ];
    tagInput.suggestions = [
      { value: 'Portrait', count: 12 },
      { value: 'Landscape', count: 8 },
      { value: 'Abstract', count: 5 }
    ];
  });
</script>

props.name: tags
props.description: Current tag list: [{ value: String, source: String }]

props.name: suggestions
props.description: Autocomplete suggestions: [{ value: String, count?: Number }]

events.name: change
events.description: Fired when tags are added or removed

components.name: wy-selection-card
components.title: Selection Card
components.description: Visual radio button card for options

examples.name: With Icon and Description
examples.code: <wy-selection-card name="size-group" label="Letter Size" description="8.5 x 11 inches. Standard office paper." icon="description" value="letter" checked></wy-selection-card>

examples.name: Group

components.name: wy-app-bar
components.title: App Bar
components.description: Application header with navigation and branding

events.name: ai-tools-click
events.description: Fired when AI Tools link is clicked

components.name: wy-library-header
components.title: Library Header
components.description: Sticky header with search and breadcrumbs

components.name: wy-controls-bar
components.title: Controls Bar
components.description: Advanced filter and view controls with automatic scroll detection and sticky pill transformation

examples.name: With Search
examples.code:
<wy-controls-bar id="controls-search" search-value="meeting minutes"></wy-controls-bar>
<script>
  customElements.whenDefined('wy-controls-bar').then(() => {
    const bar = document.getElementById('controls-search');
    bar.categories = ['Productivity', 'Expertise'];
  });
</script>

examples.name: Featured Filter Active
examples.code:
<wy-controls-bar id="controls-featured" show-featured-only></wy-controls-bar>
<script>
  customElements.whenDefined('wy-controls-bar').then(() => {
    const bar = document.getElementById('controls-featured');
    bar.categories = ['Productivity', 'Expertise', 'Travel & Shopping'];
  });
</script>

examples.name: Hidden Toggles
examples.code:
<wy-controls-bar id="controls-minimal" hide-view-toggle hide-details-toggle></wy-controls-bar>
<script>
  customElements.whenDefined('wy-controls-bar').then(() => {
    const bar = document.getElementById('controls-minimal');
    bar.categories = ['Productivity', 'Expertise'];
  });
</script>

examples.name: Scrolled State (Pill)
Full Configuration
examples.code:
<wy-controls-bar id="controls-full" view-mode="grid" show-details active-category="Expertise"></wy-controls-bar>
<script>
  customElements.whenDefined('wy-controls-bar').then(() => {
    const bar = document.getElementById('controls-full');
    bar.categories = ['Productivity', 'Expertise', 'Travel & Shopping', 'Creativity', 'Lifestyle'];
    bar.searchValue = '';
  });
</script>

events.name: filter-change
events.detail: { search: String, viewMode: String, showDetails: Boolean, category: String, showFeaturedOnly: Boolean }

notes: Automatically detects scroll position (50px threshold) and transforms to floating pill
Scrolled state: sticky positioning, backdrop blur, hides toggles, expands search (192px â†’ 280px)
Mobile: disables sticky pill, wraps controls, search becomes full-width

components.name: wy-tabs
components.title: Tabs
components.description: Text-only tab navigation with bottom border indicator

examples.name: Three Tabs
examples.code:
<wy-tabs active-tab="overview">
  <button role="tab" data-tab="overview">Overview</button>
  <button role="tab" data-tab="details">Details</button>
  <button role="tab" data-tab="settings">Settings</button>
</wy-tabs>

components.description: Portfolio allocation visualization

examples.name: With Items
examples.code:
<wy-allocation-card title="Current Allocation" id="alloc-1"></wy-allocation-card>
<script>
  const card = document.getElementById('alloc-1');
  card.items = [
    { label: 'Public Equities', value: 45, color: 'var(--md-sys-color-primary)' },
    { label: 'Real Estate', value: 25, color: '#8FA397' },
    { label: 'Private Credit', value: 20, color: '#BCCBC3' },
    { label: 'Cash & Equiv.', value: 10, color: '#E0E5E2' }
  ];
</script>

props.name: items
props.description: Allocation data: [{ label: String, value: Number, color: String }]

components.name: wy-links-modal
components.title: Links Modal
components.description: Modal dialog displaying categorized AI tool links as interactive chips

examples.name: Basic
examples.code:
<wy-links-modal id="links-modal-1" title="AI Tools" open></wy-links-modal>
<script>
  const modal = document.getElementById('links-modal-1');
  modal.links = [
    {
      category: 'Models',
      links: [
        { name: 'ChatGPT', url: 'https://chat.openai.com', active: true },
        { name: 'Gemini', url: 'https://gemini.google.com', active: false }
      ]
    }
  ];
</script>

examples.name: With Multiple Categories
examples.code:
<wy-links-modal id="links-modal-2" title="AI Tools" open></wy-links-modal>
<script>
  const modal = document.getElementById('links-modal-2');
  modal.links = [
    {
      category: 'Models',
      links: [
        { name: 'ChatGPT', url: 'https://chat.openai.com', active: true },
        { name: 'Gemini', url: 'https://gemini.google.com' }
      ]
    },
    {
      category: 'Images',
      links: [
        { name: 'AI Studio', url: 'https://aistudio.google.com', active: true },
        { name: 'Midjourney', url: 'https://midjourney.com' }
      ]
    }
  ];
</script>

examples.name: Programmatic Control
examples.code:
<button onclick="document.getElementById('links-modal-3').show()">Open Links</button>
<wy-links-modal id="links-modal-3" title="AI Tools"></wy-links-modal>
<script>
  const modal = document.getElementById('links-modal-3');
  modal.links = [{ category: 'Models', links: [{ name: 'ChatGPT', url: 'https://chat.openai.com' }] }];
  modal.addEventListener('close', () => console.log('Modal closed'));
  modal.addEventListener('link-click', (e) => console.log('Link clicked:', e.detail.link));
</script>

props.name: links
props.description: Array of category objects: [{ category: String, links: [{ name: String, url: String, active?: Boolean }] }]

events.name: close
events.description: Fired when modal closes (via close button or overlay click)

events.name: link-click
events.description: Fired when a link chip is clicked

components.name: wy-confirm-dialog
components.title: Confirm Dialog
components.description: Confirmation dialog for destructive or important actions with customizable messaging and button labels

examples.name: Default
examples.code:
<wy-confirm-dialog
  open
  heading="Confirm Action"
  message="Are you sure you want to proceed?"
></wy-confirm-dialog>

props.heading: Confirm Action
props.message: Are you sure you want to proceed?

examples.name: Destructive
examples.code:
<wy-confirm-dialog
  open
  heading="Delete Item?"
  message="This action cannot be undone. All associated data will be permanently removed."
  confirm-label="Delete"
  cancel-label="Keep"
  variant="destructive"
></wy-confirm-dialog>

examples.name: Custom Labels
examples.code:
<wy-confirm-dialog
  open
  heading="Discard Changes?"
  message="You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?"
  confirm-label="Discard"
  cancel-label="Stay"
></wy-confirm-dialog>

events.name: confirm
events.description: Fired when user clicks confirm button

events.name: cancel
events.description: Fired when user clicks cancel or dismisses dialog

components.name: wy-dropdown
components.title: Dropdown
components.description: Universal dropdown component with capsule button design

examples.name: Basic
examples.code:
<wy-dropdown
  label="STYLE"
  value="formal"
  .options=${JSON.stringify([{value: 'formal', label: 'Formal & Professional'}, {value: 'casual', label: 'Casual & Friendly'}, {value: 'technical', label: 'Technical & Precise'}])}
></wy-dropdown>

examples.name: With Placeholder
examples.code:
<wy-dropdown
  placeholder="Select an option..."
  .options=${JSON.stringify([{value: 'a', label: 'Option A'}, {value: 'b', label: 'Option B'}, {value: 'c', label: 'Option C'}])}
></wy-dropdown>

props.name: label
props.description: Optional label text (displayed uppercase above dropdown)

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text when no value selected

props.name: variant
props.description: Visual variant: 'default' (Container High bg) or 'subtle' (Container Low bg)

events.name: change
events.description: Fired when selection changes, event.detail.value contains new value
